title: Bug 121170: get column label from meta data object should return user recognizable strings
description: Currently, when retrieving the column labels from the meta data object, the labels returned before extraction are null. However, after extraction, the labels are recognizable strings. This discrepancy should be resolved so that the column labels returned from the meta data object are always user recognizable strings.
OB: The labels returned from the meta data object before extraction are null.
EB: The labels returned from the meta data object before extraction should be user recognizable strings.
SR:
1. Retrieve the column labels from the meta data object before extraction.
2. Verify that the labels are null.
3. Extract the labels from the meta data object.
4. Verify that the extracted labels are user recognizable strings.
